item.title: Marisa add a quote by Aristotle
item.description: "For the things we have to learn before we can do them, we learn by doing them." -- Aristotle

item.title: Marisa add a quote by Bernie Mac
item.description: "I ain't scared of you motherfuckers!" -- Bernie Mac

item.title: Marisa add a quote by Katharine Hepburn
item.description: "If you want to sacrifice the admiration of many men for the criticism of one, go ahead, get married." -- Katharine Hepburn

item.title: Marisa add a quote by Gilda Radner (1946-1989)
item.description: "The goal is to live a full, productive life even with all that ambiguity. No matter what happens, whether the cancer never flares up again or whether you die, the important thing is that the days that you have had you will have lived." -- Gilda Radner (1946-1989)

item.title: Marisa add a quote by Simone Weil
item.description: "To be a hero or a heroine, one must give an order to oneself." -- Simone Weil

item.title: Marisa add a quote by Salma Hayek Jiménez (1966- )
item.description: "I've stolen a couple of hearts and they are in my private collection. My heart has been stolen too - but I've gone and got it back every single time! " -- Salma Hayek Jiménez (1966- )
